reviewText: I have been a fan of Michael Pare since Eddie and the Cruisers 1 and especially Eddie and the Cruisers 2.  I liked the TV show Houston Knights 1987-88 because of him.  This had a good story line and was well acted by Pare.  I don't know why he hasn't had a TV series since his last one as his acting is as good as many on TV today and he is certainly as goodlooking today in middle age, as he was in his youth.

reviewText: oNe of the best Michael Pare' movies.I highly recommend it for any fan. Lots of non stop action. A great story plot.I really like this movie a lot.It is full of what will happen next. Michaels sympathic character gets you from the beginning. THis is a 5 star movie for me.
